TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Silupatun, title = Silupatun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silupatun} }

S.FORM: Silupatun Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Silupatun a niyaro', 61 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 181 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 174 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun88%, Amis1%, Paiwan2%, Truku1%, Seediq1%, roma4%.

Silopaton Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Silopaton a niyaro', 61 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 181 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 174 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon88%, Amis1%, Paiwan2%, Troko1%, Seediq1%, roma4%.
